name: DaQuana Tyler
text: We order from this location a lot. I hate how our order is either EXTREMELY wrong at times or the wait it outrageous. Never had a 10/10 experience. The customer service is neutral. It’s kind of like.. “whatever” from this location. Definitely don’t order with high expectations.

text: Love that howie bread.

text: Had a excellent experience in here with my daughter. The food arrives quick and the service is just fantastic. Prices are reasonable.

text: I give this place 1 star. I was trying to place an order by using their $5 coupons and the lady, who was taking my order was very impatient and rude. I will not give this place my business. I went and got me some Pizza Hut instead. Please …More

text: I come here for their wonderful pizza.  It's sooo crunchy and delicious.  Have been coming here for years.  The whole pizza tastes great and most of their specialties are awesome.

name: Dee Luna
text: The price is a tad high, but it is a better value than the average chain pizza places. The staff is attentive and is happy to help. Well worth the price paid.

name: Jessica Haltom
text: The food was amazing. We ordered 2 calzones and the 3 cheeser bread. You'll never taste anything like it anywhere else. The price is decent and well worth it! The owner is very friendly and makes sure you are satisfied. Will definitely be visiting this place more often!!

text: Good days and bad days I normally get the same order every purchase however some days i get buttered crust and parmesan on my calzone sometimes its half done... More good than bad experiences
